We're always on the hunt for passionate people.

People who want to use their creative skills to
tackle social and environmental issues.

Youâ€™ll have a real impact with your creativity.


Our creative team runs campaigns, creates content, builds brands, and makes websites for organizations that want to make the world better. We're looking for people who have skills in:

Video.

Design.

Web.

Strategy.

You should join our creative team if you:

  • Want to have an impact.

  • Want to be part of a supportive community.

  • Want to get paid.

  • Want to make cool things.

  • Want to develop your craft.

  • Want to build your portfolio.

  • Want to expand your network.

If you're interested, it's easy.

Just fill out the form below or email outreach@mymediacreative.org.
